title: why cant i pick my ward skins
body: so i haven't been able to pick my ward skins when i unlocked new ones from the augment bundles please help

replies.body: This was a known visual issue, but everything should be okay now.  Some skin wards weren't selectable even though it was unlocked on the account.  Let me know if you're still having an issue with this!

Hey fap123,

It is currently a known issue, please read [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pOslJHiQ-knownward-skins-missing) thread for details.
